data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=g8pLXug5dP4Q7kNvgFxpli4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBVbZ8SB-nfD2lWO0nQ31cOn16E8feGSFGC8jg5fYdxug&oe=6687D737)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=NoCDCCQsr3gQ7kNvgHDL7q1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBbGuv73_bz90Sro3B4x6an2tJM96xheOmRckYv6KzL7g&oe=6687E4D2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bx5VbVmmPwYQ7kNvgFOBfbG&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA_57OdbiaFMBtRZQpvdOrvAce5DEGlNYfxmABHfbXVaw&oe=6687D009)
